description.zh-cn: 唐朝文学家、诗人，中唐最具代表性的诗人之一，倡导新乐府运动。其诗歌作品平易近人，流传甚广。
description.en: A Tang dynasty writer and poet, one of the most representative poets of the mid-Tang period, and a proponent of the New Yuefu Movement. His poetry is known for its accessibility and widespread popularity.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，白居易的挚友，二人并称“元白”，共同倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet and a close friend of Bai Juyi. They were collectively known as 'Yuan Bai' and jointly advocated for the New Yuefu Movement.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝诗人，白居易晚年好友，二人唱和甚多，并称“刘白”。
description.en: A Tang dynasty poet and a friend of Bai Juyi in his later years. They often wrote poems to each other and were known as 'Liu Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝伟大的现实主义诗人，其作品对白居易的讽谕诗创作有重要影响。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang dynasty whose works significantly influenced Bai Juyi's satirical poetry.

description.zh-cn: 由白居易、元稹等人倡导的唐代诗歌革新运动，主张“文章合为时而著，歌诗合为事而作”，强调诗歌的社会功能和现实意义。
description.en: A poetic reform movement in the Tang dynasty advocated by Bai Juyi, Yuan Zhen, and others. It promoted the idea that 'prose should be written for the times, and poetry for current events,' emphasizing the social function and realistic significance of poetry.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝。因白居易言事太过直接而感到不快，后将白居易贬为江州司马。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty. He was displeased by Bai Juyi's directness in remonstrance and later demoted him to the position of Sima of Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，曾写诗吊唁白居易，并褒其为“诗仙”。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang dynasty who wrote a poem mourning Bai Juyi and praised him as the 'Poet Immortal'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝名士，在白居易初到长安时，因欣赏其诗才而为之延誉，使其声名大振。
description.en: A famous scholar of the Tang dynasty who, upon Bai Juyi's arrival in Chang'an, admired his poetic talent and helped promote his reputation, making him famous.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作的长篇叙事诗，描述了唐玄宗与杨贵妃的爱情悲剧，是其流传最广的作品之一。
description.en: A long narrative poem by Bai Juyi depicting the tragic love story of Emperor Xuanzong and Yang Guifei. It is one of his most widely circulated works.

description.zh-cn: 白居易在被贬江州期间创作的长篇叙事诗，通过描绘一位琵琶女的遭遇，抒发了自己“同是天涯沦落人”的感慨。
description.en: A long narrative poem written by Bai Juyi during his exile in Jiangzhou. By depicting the experiences of a female pipa player, he expressed his own feelings of being 'fellow sufferers at the ends of the earth'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易写给元稹的一封长信，系统地阐述了他的文学主张，是中国文学批评史上的重要文献。
description.en: A long letter from Bai Juyi to Yuan Zhen, systematically explaining his literary views. It is an important document in the history of Chinese literary criticism.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的个人诗文集，由其好友元稹在他离任杭州时收集编纂而成。
description.en: A collection of Bai Juyi's poems and writings, compiled by his friend Yuan Zhen when he left his post in Hangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 白居易与白行简之父，曾任襄州别驾等官职。
description.en: Father of Bai Juyi and Bai Xingjian, who served as Assistant Prefect of Xiangzhou and other official posts.

description.zh-cn: 白居易之弟，唐代文学家。
description.en: Younger brother of Bai Juyi, a writer in the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝东都，白居易晚年多居于此，并最终在此逝世。
description.en: The eastern capital of the Tang dynasty, where Bai Juyi spent much of his later life and eventually passed away.

description.zh-cn: 白居易曾任此地刺史，任内修筑西湖堤防、疏浚六井，有显著政绩。
description.en: Bai Juyi served as the prefect of this city, where he achieved significant accomplishments, including constructing the West Lake embankment and dredging the Six Wells.

description.zh-cn: 位于杭州的著名湖泊。白居易任杭州刺史时，曾修筑堤防以利灌溉。
description.en: A famous lake in Hangzhou. When Bai Juyi was the prefect of Hangzhou, he had an embankment built to facilitate irrigation.

description.zh-cn: 唐代官职，白居易因越职言事被贬为此职。
description.en: An official position in the Tang dynasty to which Bai Juyi was demoted for overstepping his authority in remonstrance.

description.zh-cn: 唐代地方官职，负责杭州地区的行政管理。
description.en: A local official position in the Tang dynasty, responsible for the administration of the Hangzhou area.

description.zh-cn: 唐代地方官职，负责苏州地区的行政管理。
description.en: A local official position in the Tang dynasty, responsible for the administration of the Suzhou area.

description.zh-cn: 东晋末至南朝宋初的诗人，以田园诗著称。白居易对其人品和诗风十分仰慕。
description.en: A poet from the late Eastern Jin to the early Southern Song dynasties, known for his pastoral poetry. Bai Juyi greatly admired his character and poetic style.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，白居易的诗歌作品在此地广为流传，对日本文学产生了深远影响。
description.en: An East Asian country where Bai Juyi's poetic works were widely circulated and had a profound influence on its literature.

description.zh-cn: 白居易是白季庚的次子。
description.en: Bai Juyi was the second son of Bai Jigeng.

description.zh-cn: 白行简是白季庚的儿子。
description.en: Bai Xingjian was the son of Bai Jigeng.

description.zh-cn: 白行简是白居易的弟弟。
description.en: Bai Xingjian was Bai Juyi's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 白居易与元稹是终身的好友，文学见解相似，并称“元白”，共同倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: Bai Juyi and Yuan Zhen were lifelong friends with similar literary views, known as 'Yuan Bai,' and they jointly advocated for the New Yuefu Movement.

description.zh-cn: 白居易晚年与刘禹锡交好，时常一同游览、唱和诗作，并称“刘白”。
description.en: In his later years, Bai Juyi was good friends with Liu Yuxi. They often traveled together and exchanged poems, and were known as 'Liu Bai'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易是新乐府运动的主要倡导者，主张诗歌应反映社会现实。
description.en: Bai Juyi was a major proponent of the New Yuefu Movement, advocating that poetry should reflect social reality.

description.zh-cn: 元稹与白居易一同倡导新乐府运动。
description.en: Yuan Zhen, along with Bai Juyi, advocated for the New Yuefu Movement.

description.zh-cn: 白居易被视为继杜甫之后现实主义文学的重要领袖，其讽谕诗创作深受杜甫影响。
description.en: Bai Juyi is considered an important leader of realist literature after Du Fu, and his satirical poetry was deeply influenced by Du Fu.

description.zh-cn: 白居易十分仰慕陶渊明的为人，并曾写作《效陶潜体诗十六首》模仿其风格。
description.en: Bai Juyi greatly admired Tao Yuanming's character and once wrote 'Sixteen Poems in Imitation of Tao Qian's Style'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易于唐代宗大历七年出生于河南新郑。
description.en: Bai Juyi was born in Xinzheng, Henan, in the year 772 during the reign of Emperor Daizong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 白居易初到长安时拜访名士顾况，顾况在读过其诗后大加赞赏，并为之宣传，使白居易声名大振。
description.en: When Bai Juyi first arrived in Chang'an, he visited the famous scholar Gu Kuang. After reading his poetry, Gu Kuang praised it highly and promoted him, which made Bai Juyi famous.

description.zh-cn: 815年，因宰相武元衡遇刺后，白居易上表主张严缉凶手，被认为越职言事，唐宪宗遂将他贬为江州司马。
description.en: In 815, after Chancellor Wu Yuanheng was assassinated, Bai Juyi submitted a memorial urging a strict investigation, which was deemed as overstepping his authority. Consequently, Emperor Xianzong demoted him to the position of Sima of Jiangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 唐宣宗在吊唁白居易的诗中，称其为“诗仙”。
description.en: In a poem mourning Bai Juyi, Emperor Xuanzong of Tang referred to him as the 'Poet Immortal'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易被贬谪至江州担任司马。
description.en: Bai Juyi was demoted to Jiangzhou to serve as Sima.

description.zh-cn: 白居易于长庆二年（822年）十月到任杭州刺史。
description.en: Bai Juyi took office as the Prefect of Hangzhou in the tenth month of the second year of the Changqing era (822).

description.zh-cn: 白居易于宝历元年（825年）五月到任苏州刺史。
description.en: Bai Juyi took office as the Prefect of Suzhou in the fifth month of the first year of the Baoli era (825).

description.zh-cn: 任杭州刺史期间，白居易见西湖淤塞、农田干旱，于是修筑堤防以蓄水灌溉。
description.en: During his tenure as Prefect of Hangzhou, Bai Juyi observed that the West Lake was silted up and farmland was arid, so he had an embankment constructed to store water for irrigation.

description.zh-cn: 在白居易离任杭州时，元稹要求他交出全部作品，并亲自编纂成《白氏长庆集》。
description.en: When Bai Juyi was leaving his post in Hangzhou, Yuan Zhen asked him to hand over all his works and personally compiled them into the 'Bai's Changqing Collection'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作了长篇叙事诗《长恨歌》。
description.en: Bai Juyi authored the long narrative poem 'Song of Everlasting Regret'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作了长篇叙事诗《琵琶行》。
description.en: Bai Juyi authored the long narrative poem 'The Pipa Player'.

description.zh-cn: 白居易创作了阐述其文学观点的长信《与元九书》。
description.en: Bai Juyi authored the long letter 'Letter to Yuan Jiu', which explains his literary views.

description.zh-cn: 白居易的作品在生前就已流传至日本，对日本平安时代的文学（如《源氏物语》）产生了巨大影响。
description.en: Bai Juyi's works spread to Japan during his lifetime and had a huge influence on the literature of the Heian period, such as 'The Tale of Genji'.
